entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the endorsement of Jon Atack as a BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) editor, highlighting his significant contributions and suitability for the role. Matt Corallo's suggestions received agreement, emphasizing the value Jon Atack brings to the Bitcoin development community. Jon Atack's focus on the practical concerns of Bitcoin software users is particularly appreciated, underlining the importance of addressing real-world issues within the BIP process. His consistent involvement in developing Bitcoin node software over four years showcases his dedication and reliability, traits that are considered beneficial for the responsibilities of a BIP editor. Brandon, in his communication, supports Jon's nomination, reflecting a collective acknowledgment of Jon's contributions and potential positive impact on the BIP editing process.
